mapper.select: select * from b_bookshop order by bscode asc
select * from b_sitegenre where bscode= (select bscode from b_bookshop where bsname= #{bsname}) order by sgcode asc
select b.bscate, g.sgcategory from b_bookshop b, b_sitegenre g where b.bsname=#{bsname} and g.sgname like #{sgname} '%' and b.bscode=g.bscode
select count(*) from b_pointedbook where mcode = #{usercode} and bcode = (select bcode from b_bookinfo where bisbn = #{isbn})
select i.*, a.aname, p.pname from b_pointedbook b, b_bookinfo i, b_author a, b_publisher p where b.bcode = i.bcode and b.mcode = #{usercode} and i.acode = a.acode and i.pcode = p.pcode
select * from b_searcher where btitle like '%' #{query} '%'
